daaaamn that planet looks great, I like green planets
Feasibly it could be a very very small planetoid in the center with a really large Atmosphere that doesn't move no gravity and one very large volumetric cloud.
The thing is real nebulae are *huge*, and the gas is so diffuse you could be in the middle of one and you wouldn't even notice.

Artyomka do you think i could join your dev team? i do have a few ideas ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
**daniel l.**: it is generally bester to show up with implementations instead of ideas. Ideas are a dime a dozen, implementations are priceless.
